script.name: !move.scanship
script.description: Move ship to start scanning a target
script.sourceplaintext:
$sector = $target -> get sector $race = $sector -> get owner race $target.race = $target -> get owner race
if $target == [PLAYERSHIP] AND $NotEnemy $state = 0 while 1 skip if $target -> exists break skip if [THIS] -> has same environment as $target break skip if $target == [PLAYERSHIP] break
$current.time = playing time if $state == 0 @ $ret = [THIS] -> follow object $target with precision 3000 m if $ret == FLRET_TARGETREACHED $state = 1 end else if $state == 1 * first message, we are scanned gosub sub.CheckIllegalWares if not $ret.Illegal $last.scan.time = get global variable: name='scan.time' if $last.scan.time do if ( $last.scan.time + 600 ) > $current.time break end do if random value from 0 to 5 - 1 break end
set global variable: name='scan.time' value=$current.time play sample 966 play sample: incoming transmission [IncomingTransmission.Scanned], from object [THIS] $rnd = random value from 10000 to 25000 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> escort ship $target: timeout=$rnd ms $state = 2 else if $state == 2 * first warning if not $ret.Illegal [THIS] ->send audio message [Comm.DLG_POL_LEGAL_GOODS] to player break end player loses police licence for race $race [THIS] ->send audio message [Comm.DLG_POL_ILLEGAL_GOODS] to player $raceadd notoriety: race=Player value=-1 $rnd = random value from 15000 to 35000 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> escort ship $target: timeout=$rnd ms $state = 3 else if $state == 3 * second warning gosub sub.CheckIllegalWares skip if $ret.Illegal break [THIS] ->send audio message [Comm.DLG_POL_LAST_WARNING] to player $rnd = random value from 15000 to 35000 - 1 @ = [THIS] -> escort ship $target: timeout=$rnd ms $state = 4 else * playership has still illegal goods, kill it gosub sub.CheckIllegalWares skip if $ret.Illegal break $raceadd notoriety: race=Player value=-2 [THIS] ->send audio message [Comm.DLG_C_START_FIGHTING] to player @ = [THIS] -> call script !fight.attack.object : the victim=$target follow in new sector=null break end @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms end if $state >= 2 if $target -> exists gosub FindIlegaleWareandDestroy end end else * immediatelly kill pirates while 1 skip if $target -> exists break skip if [THIS] -> has same environment as $target break if $NotEnemy @ $ret = [THIS] -> follow object $target with precision 1500 m if FLRET_TARGETREACHED == $ret if [THIS] -> scan potential pirate $target for illegal wares $trace = $target -> get owner race $raceadd notoriety: race=$trace value=-1 @ = [THIS] -> call script !fight.attack.object : the victim=$target follow in new sector=null end gosub FindIlegaleWareandDestroy break end else @ = [THIS] -> call script !fight.attack.object : the victim=$target follow in new sector=null break end end end
return null
FindIlegaleWareandDestroy: $flags = [Find.IllegalWare] | [Find.Multiple] | [Find.Nearest] $awares = find flying ware: sector=[SECTOR] maintype=null subtype=null flags=$flags refobj=$target maxdist=5000 maxnum=20, refpos=null if $awares $size = size of array $awares $i = 0 while $i < $size $ware = $awares[$i] @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.collectware : GALOBJ of flying ware=$ware destroy only=[TRUE] inc $i = end end endsub
sub.CheckIllegalWares: $ret.Illegal = [FALSE] if not $target ->get hide illegal wares flag $total.wares = $target ->get illegal ware list: race=$race skip if $total.wares $total.wares = table alloc if $target -> is of class Carrier $docked.ships = $target ->get all docked ships $i = size of array $docked.ships while $i dec $i = $ship = $docked.ships[$i] $illegal.wares = $ship ->get illegal ware list: race=$race do if $illegal.wares $total.wares = merge tables, $total.wares, $illegal.wares, null, null, null end end
if size of table $total.wares if $target -> get amount of ware Cargo Bay Shielding in cargo bay $volume = 0 $ware = get next key: table=$total.wares key=null while $ware $amt = $total.wares[$ware] $vol = get volume of ware $ware $volume = $volume + ( $amt * $vol ) $ware = get next key: table=$total.wares key=$ware end $chance = 100 - ( $volume / 2 ) $chance = get maximum, 10, $chance, null, null, null $chance = get minimum, 90, $chance, null, null, null $rnd = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 if $rnd <= $chance if $target == [PLAYERSHIP] unlock achievement: id='ACH_SNEAKY' end $target ->set hide illegal wares flag: [TRUE], timeout=300000ms $ret.Illegal = [FALSE] endsub end end $ret.Illegal = [TRUE] end end endsub return null

line.text: player loses police licence for race

comment.var: playership has still illegal goods, kill it

sval.val: Move ship to start scanning a target
playership has still illegal goods, kill it
